content: भूयस् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (सी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [अतिशयेन बहु ईयसुन्] {@--1@} More, more numerous or abundant. {@--2@} Greater, larger; <ls>Ku. 6. 13.</ls> {@--3@} More important. {@--4@} Very great or large, much, many, numerous; भवति च पुनर्भूयान्भेदः फलं प्रति तद्यथा <ls>U. 2. 4</ls>; भद्रं भद्रं वितर भगवन्भूयसे मंगलाय <ls>Māl. 1. 3</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 48</ls>; <ls>R. 17. 41</ls>; <ls>U. 2</ls>, <ls n="U.">3.</ls> {@--5@} Rich or abounding in; एवंप्रायगुणभूयसीं स्वकृतिं <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Vehement, severe. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Much, very much, exceedingly, largely, greatly. {@--2@} More, again, further more, moreover; पाथेयमुत्सृज बिसं ग्रहणाय भूयः <ls>V. 4. 15</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 46</ls>; <ls>Me. 111.</ls> {@--3@} Repeatedly, frequently; पूर्वं भूयः first, in the first place --next, in the next place. (The form भूयसा is often used adverbially in the sense of {1} very much, in a high degree, exceedingly, beyond measure, for the greater part; न खरो न च भूयसा मृदुः <ls>R. 8. 9</ls>; कुसुमपु भुवा भूयता दुःखयति <ls>Mu. 6. 9</ls>; पश्चार्धेन प्रविष्टः शरपतनभयात् भूयसा पूर्वकायं <ls>Ś. 1. 7.</ls> {2} generally, as a general rule; भूयसा जीविधर्म एवः <ls>U. 5</ls>).
